fullText: Bobby Cannavale gives a powerhouse performance as Charlie Castle, a movie star trapped between his conscience and his career in this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 drama.
dtliExcerpt: Bobby Cannavale gives a powerhouse performance as Charlie Castle, a movie star trapped between his conscience and his career in this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 drama.
